name: Prepare Demo Scenario
description: Manually triggered hook to prepare and validate demo scenarios
agent_prompt:
Please prepare the hackathon demo by:
1. Validating all sample data is properly formatted
2. Testing each agent's decision-making capabilities
3. Verifying multi-agent coordination workflows
4. Generating compelling demo scenarios with clear narratives

Use the demo guidelines from steering to ensure the presentation highlights agentic AI capabilities effectively. Focus on autonomous decision-making, agent coordination, and business value.
